title: Uchi no Maid ga Uzasugiru!: Uchi no Maid wa Yappari Mou Honto Uzainda naa...
original_name: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！うちのメイドはやっぱりもうホントウザいんだなあ......
opening_song: "Uza Uza☆Wows! (ウザウザ ☆ わおーっす！)" by Misha Takanashi (Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
ending_song: "Tokimeki☆Climax (ときめき ☆ くらいまっくす)" by Misha Takanashi Haruka Shiraishi) & Tsubame Kamoi (Manami Numakura)
sinopse: Special swimsuit-featured episode included in the fourth DVD/Blu-ray volume.
